name: ts-stream
description: Type-safe object streams with seamless support for backpressure, ending, and error handling

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && mocha dist/test/test-*.js
scripts.cover: npm run -s build && istanbul cover --report json _mocha -- -R spec dist/test/test-*.js && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -t html -o coverage/html-report
scripts.build: tsc -p src/lib/ && tsc -p src/test/ && tsc -p src/examples

author: Martin Poelstra <martin@beryllium.net>
